FunimationNow

Brief: Experience the world of anime like never before with FunimationNow, the go-to app for anime enthusiasts seeking to enjoy a vast collection of subtitled and English-dubbed anime shows. With FunimationNow, immerse yourself in high-definition anime series, movies, OVAs, and exclusive content right at your fingertips. Benefit from ad-free streaming, access to the latest simulcasts, and support the original Japanese creators by choosing an official source for your anime binge-watching.
